questions.text: Invincible's father is Omni-Man, the planet's most powerful being. What is Omni-Man's real name?
questions.explanation:
Nolan.

	Omni-Man was later revealed to be a villain, working to prepare Earth for an invasion by his native race, the Viltumites. Omni-Man then fled Earth and settled on another planet.

questions.text: Invincible's college roommate is named Johnny.
questions.explanation:
False.

	William is Invincible's roommate. When he is not saving the world, Invincible is college student Mark Grayson, who has revealed his identity to both William and to his girlfriend, Amber.

His high school principal.

	After getting in a fight, Mark's principal told him that he wasn't invincible, and a new superhero was born.

questions.text: Which member of the Teen Team did Invincible flirt with?
questions.explanation:
Atom Eve.

	The Teen Team were introduced in the second issue of Invincible's own comic series, and disbanded in the sixth issue because Robot began a new Guardians of the Globe.

questions.text: Cecil Steadman used to work with Omni-Man.
questions.explanation:
True.

	Steadman was Omni-Man's government liaison, and now serves in the same capacity to Invincible. Steadman works for a mysterious and unnamed government agency.

questions.text: Who does Invincible take along with him when he goes to Africa?
questions.explanation:
Amber.

	Atom Eve was a superhero who gave up the hero life to help the needy. She uses her powers to help people in Africa.

questions.text: Which Marvel Comics superhero group did Invincible meet?
questions.explanation:
The New Avengers.

	When the evil Angstrom Levy plunged Invincible through multiple realities, he encountered Spider-Man and the New Avengers. This took place in the fourteenth issue of "Marvel Team-Up".

questions.text: Who was the first villain that Invincible killed?
questions.explanation:
Angstrom Levy.

	Levy held Invincible's mother hostage, and this sent the teen hero into a rage. He beat up Levy as they went through several realities, and Levy later died from his injuries.

False.

	The boy's name is Oliver, not Arthur. After leaving Earth, Omni-Man settled down with an alien race and had a child, Oliver. Oliver now lives with Invincible's mother Debbie.

questions.text: Which evaluation officer used to fight Invincible?
questions.explanation:
Allen the Alien.

	Allen goes from planet to planet making sure that each world has a suitable champion to protect it. He does this by engaging heroes in combat, and Allen is very strong and fast.
